text: ane jo ame icchata to tene a ayatona karane unco hoddo apata, parantu te to duniya tarapha jhuki gayo ane potani maneccha'oni pachala padi gayo, temani dasa kutaram jevi tha'i ga'i, ke tum temana para humalo karisa to pana hamphase athava tum tene chodi da'isa to pana te hamphase, a ja dasa te lokoni che je'o'e amari ayatono inkara karyo, to tame a sthitinum varnana kari do, kadaca te loko kamika vicare
